name: thud

the sound that is made when something heavy falls or hits something else: The boy fell to the ground with a thud. I could hear the thud of horses' hoofs down the dirt road. Synonyms
clunk
thump
More examplesFewer examplesThe bomb landed with a dull thud.A loud thud rang out like a muffled gunshot.I heard a thud from upstairs and knew she had fallen out of bed.

to fall or hit something with a heavy sound: A small ball thudded to the ground close by. The soldiers marched along the street, boots thudding. Synonym
thump
More examplesFewer examplesDrums thudded, chants rose, and feet stamped.The hammock gave out from under him and he thudded to the ground.Shells thudded in the distance.
